slides.title: Time & Work Basics
slides.content:
**Work = Rate × Time**

**If A completes work in 'n' days:**
Work done in 1 day = 1/n

**Combined Work:**
A + B together = 1/a + 1/b
*Example:* A does in 6 days, B in 12 days
Together: 1/6 + 1/12 = 3/12 = 1/4 (4 days)

slides.title: Speed, Distance & Time
slides.content:
**Speed = Distance / Time**
**Distance = Speed × Time**
**Time = Distance / Speed**

**Unit Conversion:**
km/hr to m/s: Multiply by 5/18
m/s to km/hr: Multiply by 18/5

slides.title: Average Speed & Relative Motion
slides.content:
**Average Speed = Total Distance / Total Time**

**Meeting Problems:**
Opposite directions: Relative speed = S1 + S2
Same direction: Relative speed = S1 - S2

**Example:** Train 60 km/hr, Car 40 km/hr opposite → 100 km/hr relative
